testcase.name: Verify login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to url "https://www.iceland.co.uk/"........................passed Then I should be navigated to home page.....................................passed When I click on signin link.................................................passed And I enter email as "lnagabandi@gmail.com".................................passed And I enter password as "Lakshmi505"........................................passed And I click on signinsecurely button........................................passed Then I should be logged in successfully.....................................passed When I click on welcome back link...........................................passed And I click on my account link..............................................passed Then I should be navigated to account details page..........................passed When I click on communication preferences link..............................passed Then I should be navigated to update communication preferences page.........passed And Iceland marketing toggler should be set to true.........................passed
